text: Achlya is a genus of moths belonging to the subfamily Thyatirinae of the Drepanidae. ==Species== * Achlya flavicornis Linnaeus, 1758 * Achlya jezoensis (Matsumura, 1927) * Achlya hoerburgeri (Schawerda, 1924) * Achlya longipennis Inoue, 1972 * Achlya tateyamai Inoue, 1982 ==Former species== * Achlya kuramana Matsumura, 1933 ==References== Category:Thyatirinae Category:Drepanidae genera
title: Achlya (moth)
